body_html:
With PyTorch 0.4.0,

th.sparse.FloatTensor(3, 3) * th.zeros(3, 3)

gives

RuntimeError: Expected object of type torch.sparse.FloatTensor but found type torch.FloatTensor for argument #2 'other'
body_text:
With PyTorch 0.4.0,
th.sparse.FloatTensor(3, 3) * th.zeros(3, 3)
gives
RuntimeError: Expected object of type torch.sparse.FloatTensor but found type torch.FloatTensor for argument #2 'other'
body:
With PyTorch 0.4.0,

`th.sparse.FloatTensor(3, 3) * th.zeros(3, 3)`

gives

`RuntimeError: Expected object of type torch.sparse.FloatTensor but found type torch.FloatTensor for argument #2 'other'`
